name: BeerFinder
description: The project will be an app or a web application where users can:
View a real-time map of their area.
The maps must be of any part of the world.
Create points of interest (POIs) by clicking directly on the map.
View their own POIs as well as those created by other users.
Edit any existing POI, regardless of who created it.
Access detailed information about each POI.
Each POI will include data such as name, description, price, and other attributes.
The application will require an API to fetch POI data.
A database will be needed to store information about POIs, items, and users.
POI information may include items pre-created in the database, referenced via foreign keys to avoid redundancy.
Users with permission will be able to add new items.
Users without permission may submit item insertion requests.
The database should be accessible for other future applications.
Prompt: @task.json Execute tasks SEQUENTIALLY. For each step: * Capture ALL output/error * Update output_format JSON only * Move to next step ONLY if status=completed Respond ONLY with output_format JSON. Never free text.

tasks.name: Seeder for the database
tasks.description: Create a seeder for the database to populate the database with some data
subtasks: Create a seeder for the POI model to populate the database with some data
Create a seeder for the Item model to populate the database with some data
Create a seeder for the ItemRequest model to populate the database with some data
Create a seeder for the POI-Item many-to-many relationship to populate the database with some data
Create a seeder for the User model to populate the database with some data: only username with 'admin' as password

log: Task 1: Seeder for the database - All 5 subtasks completed
Subtask 1: Created seeder for POI model (seed_pois.py) - Successfully created 5 POIs
Subtask 2: Created seeder for Item model (seed_items.py) - Successfully created 5 items
Subtask 3: Created seeder for ItemRequest model (seed_item_requests.py) - Successfully created 3 item requests
Subtask 4: Created seeder for POI-Item many-to-many relationship (seed_poi_items.py) - Successfully created 6 POI-Item relationships
Subtask 5: Created seeder for User model (seed_users.py) - Admin user already exists or created successfully
output_format.command_output:
All seeders created and executed successfully:
- seed_users: User 'admin' already exists or created
- seed_pois: Created 5 POIs (Downtown Brewery, Riverside Beer Garden, Mountain View Taproom, Beachside Pub, Historic District Brewery)
- seed_items: Created 5 items (Craft Beer IPA, Lager Beer, Stout Beer, Wheat Beer, Pilsner)
- seed_item_requests: Created 3 item requests (Hazy IPA, Sour Beer, Barley Wine)
- seed_poi_items: Created 6 POI-Item relationships
output_format.next_action: All database seeders have been created and tested successfully. Ready for use.
